stories.title: View Default Content for 'What' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to view the default content under the 'What' tab so that I can learn about Lorem Ipsum.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the interface, Then the tab with text 'What' should be highlighted by default and content starting with 'Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text...' should be visible.

stories.title: Interact with 'Origin' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to click on the 'Origin' tab so that I can view its content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the default tab is highlighted, When I click on the tab with text 'Origin', Then the content under 'Origin' should be displayed, and the tab should be highlighted.

stories.title: Interact with 'Use' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to click on the 'Use' tab so that I can view its content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the default tab is highlighted, When I click on the tab with text 'Use', Then the content under 'Use' should be displayed, and the tab should be highlighted.

stories.title: Interact with 'More' Tab
stories.description: As a user, I want to click on the 'More' tab so that I can view its content.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the default tab is highlighted, When I click on the tab with text 'More', Then the content under 'More' should be displayed, and the tab should be highlighted.
